definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

pinyin: ci2 su4 tong1 da2 mo2 xing2

sentences.english: It refers to the formation of new words by adding affixes to other words or morphemes.
sentences.chinese: 将词缀加入其他单词或词素以构成新词的方法。

sentences.english: Part 3 is concerned with word classes and morphology.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分有3章，谈词类和词素。

sentences.english: Morphemes are actually abstract elements of analysis.
sentences.chinese: 词素实际上是抽象的语法分析元素。

sentences.english: The morpheme repeated prime paradigm was used to probe the mental representation of compound words.
sentences.chinese: 用词素重复启动的方法考察合成词的心理表征。

sentences.english: The thesis defines the concept and presents the formation of foreign word and foreign morpheme briefly.
sentences.chinese: 本文简单界定了外来词与外来词词素的概念和形成。

sentences.english: Morpheme is the smallest meaning-bearing unit of language.
sentences.chinese: 词素是单词的最小的有意义的组成部分。

sentences.english: The most basic element of meaning is traditionally called morpheme .
sentences.chinese: 传统上把意义的基本成分称为词素。

sentences.english: Morpheme is the basic unit in the study of morphology.
sentences.chinese: 词素是形态学研究的最基本的单位。

sentences.english: What occurs is an orthographic form in writing termed "morph" which realizes the morpheme.
sentences.chinese: 在拼写中被称为形素变体的形式形成了词素。

sentences.english: A morpheme is a dual combination of both sound and meaning.
sentences.chinese: 词素是最小的意义单位，有意义也有声音。

sentences.english: In English, the minimal meaningful units are known as morphemes.
sentences.chinese: 词素是英语中的最小语义单位。

definition: language component/morpheme/individual characters (making up an expression)
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
radical of a compound word (in European language)
